programmes.show_description: When an overworked single mother hires a friendly neighbour to babysit her daughter, she begins to face increasingly strange and threatening situations. Starring Shiva Negar (2023)
A dressmaker longs to have a wedding of her own with the man of her dreams. And she will stop at nothing to have it - even if it means killing his bride to be.
Fly with the pilots and intensive care paramedics of The Westpac Lifesaver Rescue Helicopter Service who provide emergency medical treatment and assistance to those in life-threatening situations.

A rescue operation is launched when a leisure helicopter carrying a young family comes down in a National Park, and a mountain hiker raises the alarm when he is injured by a giant boulder.
Air Rescue are called to locate a father and his two young sons who are trapped in an overturned fishing boat at sea, and three surfer friends are reported missing in challenging conditions.
A passenger faces the prospect of missing his son's operation after missing his flight, and an electrical failure causes a blackout onboard a grounded plane.
A couple of unusual passengers are causing excitement on a flight to Chicago's Sea World, and a man dressed as a tiger causes intrigue on the ground in Chicago.
There is frustration for the Airline staff as passengers turn up late and irate, and a passenger faces an anxious wait as she tries to get to her dying mother in time.
Two unaccompanied minors are close to boarding the wrong flight, and team members audition for the staff holiday cabaret - with the winners performing for passengers at the departure gates.
Staff have to handle a drunken passenger at 7am in the morning, stormy weather causes severe delays, and a supervisor has to inform a customer that he is too big for a plane seat.
Anita tells an angry family that they must buy an extra plane ticket for their toddler, and a passenger supervisor tries to calm a nervous flyer in Los Angeles.
Anita tells an angry family that they must buy an extra plane ticket for their toddler, and a passenger supervisor tries to calm a nervous flyer in Los Angeles.
The largest blackout in US history causes chaos to air travel with flight delays, cancellations and airports filled with increasingly angry stranded passengers.
A Southwest pilot is set to retire after 30 years of service, and it is the end of an era for Chicago's Terminal F.
(1971) Comedy western with Lee Van Cleef and James Mason. It's a wild ride of bank robbing, wife swapping and double crossing as two rivals team up to steal a million bucks from the government.
(1946) Western with Randolph Scott, Edgar Buchanan and Lloyd Bridges. As tensions build between unruly cattlemen and determined homesteaders in post-Civil War Kansas, can one man keep the peace?
(2011) Red-hot action adventure with Rachel Hunter. Can a volcano expert blow the whistle on an illegal oil drilling operation before it sets off a city-destroying super-volcano beneath Miami?
The world's largest particle collider malfunctions and opens a portal to a nightmare dimension.
A group of scientists need to prevent the world from entering a new ice age. Starring Jeff Fahey and Erika Eleniak (2006).
(2015) Action with Mark Lutz. When an asteroid threatens to obliterate Earth, a discredited astrophysicist is humanity's last hope. Armed with cutting-edge tech, can he prevent a global disaster?
When the pilot of a passenger plane is killed by a rogue solar flare, one of the passengers has to step up and try to land the plane.

When he is imprisoned aboard a CIA submarine under mysterious circumstances, a deep cover operative joins forces with another prisoner to break free. Stars Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dolph Lundgren (2018)
A squad of elite human soldiers faces down a powerful and deadly extraterrestrial army. Starring Kevin Sorbo (2014)

programmes.show_name: Jack Hunter And The Quest For Akhenaten'
programmes.show_description: (2008) Fantasy adventure starring Ivan Sergei. Globetrotting archaeologist Jack Hunter has to try and stop an ancient super weapon from falling into the wrong hands.

programmes.show_name: Jack Hunter And The Star Of Heaven
programmes.show_description: (2008) Action starring Ivan Sergei. When archaeologist Jack Hunter's mentor is killed, he must find the culprit and stop ancient treasure falling into the wrong hands.
A rescue crew fly to the remote Babel Island to help a man who is suffering from chest pains, and an out-of-control car pins a grandmother to a wall, crushing her foot and pelvis.
A Gold Coast holidaymaker is caught in a deadly ocean rip current, a skydiver is airlifted to hospital, and a groom-to-be is left gripping to the side of a mountain with a suspected broken leg.
An injured man clings to the rocks after falling into the ocean, and a head-on car collision leaves two tourists fighting for their lives.
A group of amateur scuba divers find themselves in trouble when their boat capsizes, and a son tries to get urgent help for his dad after a nasty trailbike accident.
Fly with the pilots and intensive care paramedics of The Westpac Lifesaver Rescue Helicopter Service who provide emergency medical treatment and assistance to those in life-threatening situations.
Manager Colleen's patience is tested to the limit by a rowdy group of BMX bikers, a boy takes his first unaccompanied flight, and a stressed mum and her two kids miss their flight in Chicago.
Supervisor Mike Carr turns detective as he tries to solve the mystery of a missing ticket, and a passenger travels to LA to fulfil her lifelong dream to be a contestant on The Price is Right.
A customer changes her clothes in full sight of her fellow passengers, the police are called to assist with a group of drunk women, and in Chicago, it is 70's day at the airport.
A group of women head to the airport bar ahead of their trip to Las Vegas for a bachelorette party, and airline staff are excited in anticipation for the company's Southwest Spirit party.
In Los Angeles, a swarm of dangerous bees have set up a hive at Gate 13, and a customer supervisor is excited to learn that a royal passenger will be travelling through LAX.
Flight attendant Heather Hale is shocked when her boyfriend asks her an important question, and a student attempts to get to New York to see his girlfriend.
Flight attendant Heather Hale is shocked when her boyfriend asks her an important question, and a student attempts to get to New York to see his girlfriend.
The airline's customer service team face the challenge of getting passengers to Florida when the flight they are booked onto is oversold.
(2015) Sci-Fi action with Mike Dopud. A fractured family is caught up in a lethal lightning storm. Amidst the terror and destruction, can they find a way to unite and survive?

programmes.show_name: Disaster Zone: Volcano in New York
programmes.show_description: (2006) Fiery drama with Michael Ironside. Things heat up when an underground experiment blows the lid off Manhattan - literally. With lava in the streets, a construction crew must plug the meltdown.
(2010) Sci-fi action adventure starring Kari Matchett. An astronomer works to save the city of San Francisco from total annihilation when a once-in-a-lifetime celestial event turns into a nightmare.
(2008) Disaster film starring Sebastian Spence. When a deadly jet stream vortex unleashes tornadoes over Manhattan, a race begins to stop the storm before the city is torn apart.

programmes.show_name: Last Days Of Frank and Jesse James, The
programmes.show_description: A western about the notorious bank robbers, Frank and Jesse James
(1963) War drama starring Victor French and Majel Barrett. With the aid of local partisans, a group of American soldiers try to make it through enemy-occupied Italy to safety.
(1947) Western with the legendary John Wayne. A wounded gunslinger is taken in by a Quaker girl, who inspires him to give up his old ways - until his past catches up with him and puts her in danger.
A former police detective takes on the local mob to avenge his estranged son's death. Stars Steven Seagal, Johnny Messner, DMX (2019)
(2014) Moody crime thriller with Liam Hemsworth, John Malkovich and Billy Bob Thornton. Could capturing a crime on camera be a couple's ticket out of Cut Bank? Escaping a small town can be murder...
